_sText:
A perfect map for trikz training.

note: This map is not build for puplic, it is perfect for:
      Longjump training
      Trikjump training
      mappers who want to build a Trikz_ map
-as you can count each Unit.


There are 3 different areas
All areas contain teleporters to the other areas and a healh give side.

1.Weapons: Here you can find weapons like scout or awp.
           You can also find information about the "Unitcounter".
           There is a hidden skywalk to get hegrenades and smokes.
2.+3.Jump: Each area contain a flashspawner, a flash jump platform 
           and 7 platform control buttons:
           (2 of each of the 3 different speed and 1 stop button)
      The 2.Highjump area got a horizontal moving platform and "Unitcounter"
            => Perfect for jumps, trying to get as high as possible.
      The 3.Longjump area got a vertikal moving platform and "Unitcounter"
            => Perfect for jumps, trying to get as far as possible.

The "Unitcounter":
   Have a look at the nearest line of the "Unitcounter" to the platform,
   to see how far or high you jumped in units.
How to read it?
=> Each coulour stands for a number in units:
   black=0; dark-red=1; dark-blue=2; dark-green=3; yellow=4; light red=5;
   light blue=6; light green=7; light brown=8; white=9
=> There are 4 rows:
   Multiply the left/top row by 1000; the second left/top row by 100;
   the second right/bottom row by 10 and add them up.
=> Last row:
   (One purple or black stripe stands for 1 unit)
   Add the sum of stripes that are after the last coulour change in the 
   second right/bottom row;
   Or subtract the sum of stripes that are before the next coulour change 
   in the second right/bottom row after adding 10
= You now have the number of units you jumped.

1 unit = 1 inch = 2.54 centimeters
Thanks to snow, tweak, .pyr0, kiste, moca!!! and tanya

Hello. This is a very old map of mine, which I did, but nobody played it, because I abandoned it.

Now I was able to find it on my flash drive, which was not used for 5 years! On the map, I changed the distance to normal, prepared all the playable moments.

The map is not really complicated, but it's not easy either. But playable, I did not change the texture on the map, left the game as it was before me, but the levels are all fixed.

Try to play it!

trikz_shinsekai
===============
trikz_shinsekai is intended to be the first trikz map based on the no-bug plugin. If you're trying to play this map on a server without this plugin then just give up as you won't even reach difficulty 4. Most players won't finish this map and the majority of them may think the map isn't even doable. The difficulty of this map is much higher than any map currently around, and it's possible thanks to the no-bug plugin. 

Description
===========
- A spawn area which includes sky (425 to 475), longjump (255 to 265) and runboost (545 to 555)
- 40 levels seperated in 4 difficulties
- An additionnal bonus stage
- Designed for 1337aa and server running no-bug plugin

Gameplay video (played by Nyastle and Atx, video made by Tony montana)
======================================================================
<iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/MDOuUSnwoGc" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

FAQ
===
Why did you choose this skybox ?
--------------------------------
When I started this project 6 months ago I already had in mind the 4 exact themes I wanted in my map. However when I reached difficulty 4, I couldn't manage to get a good design idea with the theme I chose. That's why I decided to change the theme of difficulty 4, even if it meant that the skybox wouldn't fit at all.

Why did you use 4 differents themes ?
-------------------------------------
My map is inspired by trikz_alterial_final which is in my opinion one of the best map in trikz. And I really liked their idea of 1 theme per difficulty. However, I don't think I managed to get something as good as trikz_alteria_final, and for a first map it would have been easier (and maybe better) to do only 1 difficulty. 

Is it possible to cheat some levels ?
-------------------------------------
Difficulties 1 and 2 aren't anti-cheated at maximum because those difficulties are mostly for average players and shouldn't be that hard to finish.
However, difficulties 3 and 4 are anti-cheated at their maximum using 3 differents anti-cheat : noflash area, nobhop area, no sky area. 
Even though I did my best to anti-cheat most of the levels, I'm pretty sure people will find some ways to cheat.

Why did you use so much surf in your levels ?
---------------------------------------------
Just like trikz (from a flyer point of view), surf requires a lot of control. That's why I choose to use more surf than other trikz maps.

Will you release another map ? 
------------------------------
I don't think I'll ever make a map of this size again, it required A LOT of time, effort and determination but I also needed to find a server for each test. However, I may release my first ever trikz map in the coming months because of the severe lack of new maps, however this map is complete shit so I'll let the players decide whether they want to play it or not, even a shit map would be good for the trikz community nowadays.

Changes log
===========
- **Map is now called "trikz_shinsekai_final" to avoid problems with the first version**
- Audio size optimized
- Particles fixed
- Sprites fixed
- Some triggers and textures fixed

READ THIS:

Just to make sure; textures arent from portal 2, their custom textures, made by reacz. Hes texture pack is totally approved and if you compare these to originals, you will notice some differences. If in ur opinion their too similar with originals, complain to him rather than me. And models are made with hammer addon called propper. it will compile brushes into models. Obviously map`s been inspirated by portal and i dont need you to tell me that^^

Hopefully Authors are listed "right" way this time^^ but just what is big difference if they are listed in text with links?^^

Note; couldnt pack particles corectly so added them in folder. If someone knows how pack particles, please tell.

add 


particles_manifest
{
"file"		"particles/combine_fx.pcf"
"file"		"particles/tubes.pcf"
}

to your cstrike/particles/particles_manifest if particles arent otherwise visible.

Tonight is the night...
The LDR Leafambient limitation forced me to stop adding more levels and details, which is a pitty. Therefore, do not complain about too few details and simply enjoy the long-awaited, extremely balanced and creative map "trikz_RandomRaider" (a bit of irony here).
In contrast to the bhop maps I built before, this is a multiplayer based "Trikz" map and probably my last map ever. It was fun to build and test and I hope many people share my exitement. Play it as much as you can. Find all secrets. Complete all levels. Increase your skill. Have fun.

It consists of:
- 30 Stages
- x2..x6 Flashboost
- 92..448 Units Skyboost
- 265..275 Units Slowmotion Longjump
- 1 Difficult Bonus
- 4 Secrets
- 1 Extremely Difficult Bonus
-> only playable, if everything has been finished (whole map, x5, 448u Sky, 274 LJ, Bonus 1)
Additionally, two videos on youtube are provided. In case of being stuck in a stage/bonus - the conclusion might be assistant.

Peace,
Random.

This is a pratice map I did a while ago and I just found it back in an old USB drive. Like some people asked me for this map in the past, I'll publish it here. This map contains :
- LongJump from 250 to 280 units
- Runboost from 530 to 600 units
- Sky from 350 to 600 units
- MegaHigh flash from x1 to x5
- MegaLong flash from x1 to x10

Note : Some of the distance may be impossible (such as 600 RB) or wrong (such as x10 ML distance calculated with an algorithm).

Edit : It seems like the triggers in the MegaLong room were all removed when I compiled the map, but it's now fixed. (Redownload it if you'd the first version - Sorry)

Hello!

I give you my third map for joint passage.

On this map are all the complexities of the complex, from the simplest to the most complex.

The map is much smaller levels, as on my previous maps.

According to all the players, they do not like very long maps.

I heard them and decided not to make a small one, but I also do not enlarge the map!

When all levels of the map pass, there is a bonus solo level.

And there is also a bonus pass with a longjump 26- with a prize of the pickax with the binding of the scout, if you pass the bonus then take this prize pickax!

When you turn on the song, the player displays the song in the center of the screen, and plays only with a block of music. Because many players do not like the inclusion of music when they pass the map elsewhere.

The design and textures on the map look in the style of minecraft, and look very cool.

WHY DESIGN MINECRAFT?

I lost on windows 10 minecraft and decided to make a myinstyle map in my favorite CS game: SOURCE!

I trained all levels with my friend.

I really hope that you will enjoy playing on my map!

Description : =============
I haved played so much trikz maps that I wanted to create something new. Therefore I have created trikz_mycraft. It isn't a long map, and the levels are not very hard, but I just wanted to make something simple, creative and fairly new. All the bugs have been fixed and I opted for chat messages when required. So I hope you'll enjoy this, my map without any pretention.
Software used : ================== - Hammer Editor - Photoshop CC Don't forget : ==============
Ask me an private message if you see any bug, and don't forget to write an comment and rate if you like or not, ty all !
Version : =========
**//! New version is available !\\** trikz mycraft final 2 : Probleme with the final texture on the pickaxe and the floor have been fixed.
Server with the map, don't forget to add she on you'r server and send my an private message : ========
